title: To prepare the structural design, calculations and details of all buildings and carry out verification of reinforcement as per stages of work
clause_text: To prepare the structural design, calculations and details of all buildings and carry out verification of reinforcement as per stages of work. To carry out structural audit / structural condition survey of the existing / old buildings.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: To prepare the structural design, calculations and details of all buildings and carry out verification of reinforcement as per stages of work.
